product.name: Razer Naga Chroma Black Wired Gaming Mouse

product.name: Razer Kraken USB Black Gaming Headset
product.description: Feast your ears on full-blooded gaming audio with the Razer Kraken USB. Everything in your games will be heard in immersive virtual surround, customizable to your needs via the Razer Surround calibration software. An included anti-noise microphone ensures teamwork and VOIP calls are conducted in absolute clarity.

product.name: Sony PS4 Platinum Wireless Gaming Headset
product.description: The Platinum Wireless Headset redefines premium gaming audio by creating an incredibly rich and detailed soundstage for your virtual world, faithfully delivering everything from the whisper of ghosts to the thunder of guns in stunning 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound powered by revolutionary 3D Audio technology.

product.name: Sony PlayStation DualShock 4 Controller
product.description: The DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controller defines the new generation of play, combining revolutionary features with an intuitive design and precise controls.

product.name: Xbox One Wireless Controller
product.description: Experience the enhanced comfort and feel of the new Xbox Wireless Controller, with a sleek, streamlined design and textured grip.

product.name: Nintendo Switch Joy-Con Controller Pair
product.description: Pick up an extra set (or two) of Joy-Con, the controllers that make new kinds of gaming possible.

product.name: The Evil Within
product.description: Developed by Shinji Mikami -- creator of the seminal Resident Evil series -- and the talented team at Tango Gameworks.

product.name: Far Cry 5
product.description: Welcome to Hope County, Montana. This idyllic place is home to a community of freedom-loving people - and a fanatical doomsday cult known as The Project at Eden's Gate.

product.name: Assassin's Creed Origins
product.description: Set in mysterious Ancient Egypt, Assassin’s Creed® Origins is a new beginning.

product.name: Tekken 7

product.name: Watch Dogs 2
product.description: In 2016, ctOS 2.0, an advanced operating system networking city infrastructure, was implemented in several US cities to create a safer, more efficient metropolis.

product.name: Battlefield 1 Revolution
product.description: Join the strong Battlefield community and jump into the epic battles of The Great War in this critically acclaimed first-person shooter.

product.name: Far Cry 5
product.description: Welcome to Hope County, Montana. This idyllic place is home to a community of freedom-loving people - and a fanatical doomsday cult known as The Project at Eden's Gate.

product.name: Assassin’s Creed: Origins
product.description: Assassin's Creed® Origins is a new beginning. Take on epic enemies with a whole new combat system.

product.name: Thief
product.description: Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this treacherous place, where the Baron's Watch spreads a rising tide of fear and oppression, his skills are the only things he can trust.

product.name: Call of Duty: WWII
product.description: Call of Duty® returns to its roots with Call of Duty®: WWII - an experience that redefines World War II for a new gaming generation.

product.name: Just dance 2018
product.description: Just Dance 2018 is the newest game from the Just Dance franchise!

product.name: Lego City Undercover
product.description: In LEGO® CITY Undercover, players become Chase McCain, a police officer who goes undercover to hunt down the notorious – and recently escaped – criminal, Rex Fury.

product.name: FIFA 18 Standard Edition
product.description: EA SPORTS FIFA 18 on Nintendo Switch is the most immersive, social, and authentic football game ever created for Nintendo players.

product.name: Warlords of Draenor
product.description: Across Draenor's savage jungles and battle-scarred plains, Azeroth's heroes will engage in a mythic conflict.

product.name: Resident Evil 7 Biohazard
product.description: Resident Evil 7 biohazard sets a new course for the Resident Evil series as it leverages its roots and opens the door to a truly terrifying horror experience..

product.name: Prey
product.description: You are Morgan Yu, the subject of morally dubious experiments designed to improve the human race.
